name: Monachopsis
description:
Monachopsis (Working title)

Feeling out of place.

Congrats! You just graduated college! But nobody told you everything was about to change. How do you maintain friendships post college. Your world is falling part, will your friendships fall too? Now what?

Authors note:

Due to personal reasons I wasn't able to dedicate as much time as I originally want for this jam. That being said, I may continue development on this to some capacity in the future.

Game development by Bec R.
